alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 12:28PM EST until January 23 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
